Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers (68-67) are welcoming the Boston Red Sox (69-65) at Comerica Park on Sunday. The expected starting pitchers will be Cooper Criswell and Ty Madden.
As a team, the Boston Red Sox are putting up 4.8 runs per game, which has them sitting at 8th in MLB.
The Detroit Tigers have compiled an OBP of .298 in addition to a batting average of .234 so far this year.
